description: Campaigners gather at Colwyn Bay pier ahead of a meeting with the Heritage Lottery Fund as efforts to save it continue.
title: 'Save our pier' calls in Colwyn Bay
title_page: 'Save our pier' calls in Colwyn Bay - BBC News
maintext:
More than 150 campaigners gathered at Colwyn Bay pier on Friday as part of a campaign to revive it.
Members of the Colwyn Victoria Pier Trust met with Heritage Lottery Fund officials as part of the bid for a Â£9.6m grant from the organisation.
People hope to breathe new life into the dilapidated pier.
Meanwhile, a legal fight between former owner Steve Hunt and the council is continuing, with both sides claiming they own it.
